trans-unit.resname: Get Involved
Sharing Platform
We're sorry, something went wrong fetching the latest release info. You can still download releases on GitHub.
trans-unit.source: We're sorry, something went wrong fetching the latest release info. You can still download releases on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, algo ha salido mal al buscar información del último lanzamiento. Aún puedes descargar los lanzamientos en GitHub.

trans-unit.resname:
LMMS is included in most major Linux distribution's package repositories.
Please contact us if your distribution is not listed here.
trans-unit.source:
LMMS is included in most major Linux distribution's package repositories.
Please contact us if your distribution is not listed here.
trans-unit.target: LMMS esta incluido en la mayoria de las grandes distribuciones de Linux. por favor contactenos si su distribucion no se encuentra listada aqui.

trans-unit.resname: For installing LMMS on Debian based distributions such as Debian itself, Ubuntu or Linux Mint, just click the button below.
trans-unit.source: For installing LMMS on Debian based distributions such as Debian itself, Ubuntu or Linux Mint, just click the button below.
trans-unit.target: Para instalar LMMS en Debian y distribuciones basadas en Debian como Ubuntu o Linux Mint, haz click en el botón que se muestra debajo.

trans-unit.resname: Install LMMS now
From your package manager
If this doesn't work for you, run this command in a terminal.
trans-unit.source: If this doesn't work for you, run this command in a terminal.
trans-unit.target: Si no ha funcionado, ejecuta este comando en un terminal.

trans-unit.resname: If the traditional repositories lag behind on versions, try the KXStudio repository.
trans-unit.source: If the traditional repositories lag behind on versions, try the KXStudio repository.
trans-unit.target: Si los repositorios tradicionales tienen versiones antiguas, intenta usar el repositorio KXStudio.

trans-unit.resname: VST Support
If your distribution offers VST support (requires the installation of Wine) it is generally offered in a separate package. For example, using the KXStudio repository, run this command in a terminal.
trans-unit.source: If your distribution offers VST support (requires the installation of Wine) it is generally offered in a separate package. For example, using the KXStudio repository, run this command in a terminal.

trans-unit.resname: Run the following command as root in a terminal:
trans-unit.source: Run the following command as root in a terminal:
trans-unit.target: Ejecuta el siguiente comando como SuperUsuario (root) en un terminal:

trans-unit.resname: Run the following command in a terminal:
trans-unit.source: Run the following command in a terminal:
trans-unit.target: Ejecuta el siguiente comando en un terminal:

trans-unit.resname: For VST support, please install wine or wine-staging from the repository
trans-unit.source: For VST support, please install wine or wine-staging from the repository

trans-unit.resname: AOSC OS ships LMMS on various architectural ports (AMD64/x86_64, ARMv7, and more to come in the future), with VST support enabled by default on AMD64.
trans-unit.source: AOSC OS ships LMMS on various architectural ports (AMD64/x86_64, ARMv7, and more to come in the future), with VST support enabled by default on AMD64.
trans-unit.target: AOSC OS viene con ports de LMMS para varias arquitecturas (AMD64/x86_64, ARMv7, y más por venir), con soporte para VST habilitado por defecto en AMD64.

trans-unit.resname: To install LMMS on AOSC OS with PackageKit (recommended):
trans-unit.source: To install LMMS on AOSC OS with PackageKit (recommended):
trans-unit.target: Para instalar LMMS en AOSC OS con PackageKit (recomendado):

trans-unit.resname: To install LMMS on AOSC OS with DPKG:
trans-unit.source: To install LMMS on AOSC OS with DPKG:
trans-unit.target: Para instalar LMMS en AOSC OS con DPKG:

trans-unit.resname: Build LMMS from source
trans-unit.target: Construir LMMS a partir del código fuente

trans-unit.resname: If your Linux distribution does not provide a lmms package (or only an outdated one), you can still build LMMS from source. Visit the LMMS development wiki on GitHub for instructions on how to compile LMMS for Linux.
trans-unit.source: If your Linux distribution does not provide a lmms package (or only an outdated one), you can still build LMMS from source. Visit the LMMS development wiki on GitHub for instructions on how to compile LMMS for Linux.
trans-unit.target: Si tu distribución de Linux no te proporciona un paquete lmms (o uno desactualizado/caduco), puedes compilar LMMS desde el código fuente. Visita la Wiki de desarrollo de LMMS en GitHub para las instrucciones de cómo compilar LMMS para Linux.

trans-unit.resname: Download LMMS
Downloading and using LMMS is free! Just choose the operating system you want to run LMMS on:
trans-unit.source: Downloading and using LMMS is free! Just choose the operating system you want to run LMMS on:
trans-unit.target: ¡Descargar y usar LMMS es gratis! Simplemente elige el sistema operativo en el que deseas ejecutar LMMS:

trans-unit.resname: Install LMMS on Linux
Click one of the buttons below to download LMMS for Linux.
trans-unit.source: Click one of the buttons below to download LMMS for Linux.
trans-unit.target: Pulsa uno de los siguientes botones para descargar LMMS para Linux.

trans-unit.resname: Stable Versions
Run chmod +x ~/Downloads/*.AppImage to set the .AppImage executable before running
trans-unit.source: Run chmod +x ~/Downloads/*.AppImage to set the .AppImage executable before running
trans-unit.target: Ejecuta chmod +x ~/Downloads/*.AppImage para preparar el ejecutable.AppImage antes de iniciarlo

trans-unit.resname: Beta Versions
Other options
Install LMMS on Windows
Click one of the buttons below (either 32bit or 64bit) to download LMMS for Windows
trans-unit.source: Click one of the buttons below (either 32bit or 64bit) to download LMMS for Windows
trans-unit.target: Haz click en uno de los botones siguientes (32bit ó 64bit) para descargar LMMS para Windows

trans-unit.resname: Install LMMS on macOS
Click one of the buttons below to download LMMS for macOS
trans-unit.source: Click one of the buttons below to download LMMS for macOS
trans-unit.target: Haga Clic en Uno de Los Botones a Continuación Para Descargar LMMS En MacOS

trans-unit.resname: Downloads labeled Beta are pre-release software, stability may suffer.
trans-unit.source: Downloads labeled Beta are pre-release software, stability may suffer.
trans-unit.target: Las descargas etiquetadas como "Beta" son programas en etapa de pruebas. La estabilidad de los mismos puede verse afectada.

trans-unit.resname: Previous releases
Show release notes

LMMS is a free, open-source software built entirely by a small number of volunteers in their free time. But to keep the project going, we need this number to grow. So if you feel like giving something back to the community, join us in making LMMS better!
trans-unit.source: LMMS is a free, open-source software built entirely by a small number of volunteers in their free time. But to keep the project going, we need this number to grow. So if you feel like giving something back to the community, join us in making LMMS better!
trans-unit.target: LMMS es un programa gratuito de código abierto creado en su totalidad por un pequeño grupo de voluntarios en su tiempo libre. Para mantener este proyecto en marcha, necesitamos que más personas se nos unan. Si te gustaría aportar algo a la comunidad, únete para continuar mejorando LMMS!

trans-unit.resname: What you can do
There are multiple ways of contributing:
trans-unit.source: There are multiple ways of contributing:

trans-unit.resname: Join Development

We are in desperate need of new developers to join our team. LMMS is written in C++ using the Qt Framework, so if you know a thing or two about these, don't hesitate to get yourself dirty with coding!
trans-unit.source: We are in desperate need of new developers to join our team. LMMS is written in C++ using the Qt Framework, so if you know a thing or two about these, don't hesitate to get yourself dirty with coding!
trans-unit.target: Necesitamos desesperadamente nuevos desarrolladores que se unan a nuestro equipo. LMMS está escrito en C++ bajo el marco de desarrollo Qt, así que si sabes aunque sea un poco de ello, no dudes en poner manos a la obra!

trans-unit.resname: See our GitHub Wiki and our bug tracker to get started. Furthermore, the LMMS mailing list is a great place to introduce yourself.
trans-unit.source: See our GitHub Wiki and our bug tracker to get started. Furthermore, the LMMS mailing list is a great place to introduce yourself.
trans-unit.target: Consulta nuestra Wiki en GitHub y nuestro Seguimiento de errores para empezar. Además, la lista de correo de LMMS es un buen lugar para presentarte.

trans-unit.resname: Website & Docs
You can help us by improving this website or documenting the software. The website sources are in our GitHub repo LMMS/lmms.io, our documentation is hosted using a MediaWiki instance.
trans-unit.source: You can help us by improving this website or documenting the software. The website sources are in our GitHub repo LMMS/lmms.io, our documentation is hosted using a MediaWiki instance.
trans-unit.target: Puedes ayudarnos mejorando este sitio o documentando el programa. El código del sitio se encuentra en nuestro repo de GitHub LMMS/lmms.io, nuestra documentación se aloja usando una instancia de MediaWiki.

trans-unit.resname: Public registration on our Wiki is disabled due to spam issues. Please post to the mailing list if you're interested in helping out with the documentation!
trans-unit.source: Public registration on our Wiki is disabled due to spam issues. Please post to the mailing list if you're interested in helping out with the documentation!
trans-unit.target: En nuestra Wiki el registro público se encuentra deshabilitado debido al spam. Por favor anuncia en la lista de correo si deseas ayudar con la documentación!

trans-unit.resname: Even though donations are not the thing we need the most (that'd be developers), they help us pay our bills, for our domain lmms.io for instance.
trans-unit.source: Even though donations are not the thing we need the most (that'd be developers), they help us pay our bills, for our domain lmms.io for instance.
trans-unit.target: Aunque lo que más necesitamos no son donaciones (sino desarrolladores), nos ayudan a pagar las cuentas, del dominio lmms.io entre otras.

trans-unit.resname: Donate via PayPal

If your language is missing in LMMS, help the project and other users speaking the same language by translating the software. You can find instructions on the page "Creating a localization" in our GitHub Wiki.
trans-unit.source: If your language is missing in LMMS, help the project and other users speaking the same language by translating the software. You can find instructions on the page "Creating a localization" in our GitHub Wiki.
trans-unit.target: Si LMMS no se encuentra disponible en tu idioma, ayuda al proyecto y a otros usuarios de tu lengua traduciendo el programa. Puedes encontrar las instrucciones en la página "Crear una localización" en nuestra Wiki de GitHub.

trans-unit.resname: How to get in touch
Mailing List
Posting to the mailing list is the best way to reach out to our developers:
trans-unit.source: Posting to the mailing list is the best way to reach out to our developers:
trans-unit.target: Escribir a la lista de correo es el mejor modo de ponerte en contacto con nuestros desarrolladores:

trans-unit.resname: Subscribe to LMMS-Devel mailing list
trans-unit.target: Suscríbete a la lista de correo LMMS-Devel

trans-unit.resname: Our IRC channel is #lmms on Freenode.
trans-unit.source: Our IRC channel is #lmms on Freenode.
trans-unit.target: Nuestro canal IRC es #lmms en Freenode.

trans-unit.resname: Discord is a more modern alternative to IRC. Join our server by clicking here.
trans-unit.source: Discord is a more modern alternative to IRC. Join our server by clicking here.
trans-unit.target: Discord es una alternativa más actual a IRC. Únete a nuestro servidor pulsando aquí.

trans-unit.resname: We host a forum for our users here on this website:
trans-unit.source: We host a forum for our users here on this website:
trans-unit.target: Alojamos un foro para nuestros usuarios en este mismo sitio:

trans-unit.resname: For reporting a bug or suggesting a new feature, please use the GitHub issue tracker:
trans-unit.source: For reporting a bug or suggesting a new feature, please use the GitHub issue tracker:
trans-unit.target: Para reportar un problema o sugerir una nueva funcionalidad, utiliza el seguidor de problemas de GitHub:

trans-unit.resname: Let's make music
with a free, cross-platform tool for your computer.
trans-unit.source: with a free, cross-platform tool for your computer.
trans-unit.target: con una herramienta libre y multiplataforma para tu computadora.

trans-unit.resname: Download now
Get involved
Making beats has never been easier.
trans-unit.source: Making beats has never been easier.
trans-unit.target: Crear ritmos nunca fue tan sencillo.

trans-unit.resname: Produce music with your computer
by creating melodies and beats, synthesizing and mixing sounds, arranging samples and much more.
trans-unit.source: by creating melodies and beats, synthesizing and mixing sounds, arranging samples and much more.
trans-unit.target: haciendo melodías y ritmos, sintetizando y mezclando sonidos, arreglando muestras y mucho más.

trans-unit.resname: Playback instruments, samples and plugins
with a typing or MIDI keyboard in a user-friendly and modern interface.
trans-unit.source: with a typing or MIDI keyboard in a user-friendly and modern interface.
trans-unit.target: con el teclado de tu compu o un teclado MIDI, en una interfaz moderna y fácil de usar.

trans-unit.resname: Bundled with ready-to-use content
trans-unit.target: Empaquetado con contenido listo para usar

trans-unit.resname: from an assortment of instrument and effect plugins, presets and samples to VST and SoundFont support.
trans-unit.source: from an assortment of instrument and effect plugins, presets and samples to VST and SoundFont support.
trans-unit.target: desde un surtido de instrumentos y efectos, preconfiguraciones y muestras hasta soporte para VST y SoundFont.

trans-unit.resname: Core Functionality
Compose music on Windows, Linux and macOS
trans-unit.source: Compose music on Windows, Linux and macOS
trans-unit.target: Compón musica en Windows, Linux y macOS

trans-unit.resname: Sequence, compose, mix and automate songs in one simple interface
trans-unit.source: Sequence, compose, mix and automate songs in one simple interface
trans-unit.target: Compone canciones, crea secuencias, mezcla y automatiza en una interfaz simple

trans-unit.resname: Note playback via MIDI or typing keyboard
trans-unit.source: Note playback via MIDI or typing keyboard
trans-unit.target: Toca las notas con un controlador MIDI o usando el teclado de tu computadora

trans-unit.resname: Consolidate instrument tracks using Beat+Bassline Editor
trans-unit.source: Consolidate instrument tracks using Beat+Bassline Editor
trans-unit.target: Consolida las pistas de instrumento usando el Editor de Ritmo+Bajo

trans-unit.resname: Fine tune patterns, notes, chords and melodies using Piano Roll Editor
trans-unit.source: Fine tune patterns, notes, chords and melodies using Piano Roll Editor
trans-unit.target: Ajusta con precisión patrones, notas, acordes y melodías con el Editor en Piano Roll

trans-unit.resname: Full user-defined track-based automation and computer-controlled automation sources
trans-unit.source: Full user-defined track-based automation and computer-controlled automation sources
trans-unit.target: Automatización completa basada en pistas definidas por el usuario y fuentes de automatización controladas por computadora

trans-unit.resname: Import of MIDI files and Hydrogen project files
trans-unit.source: Import of MIDI files and Hydrogen project files
trans-unit.target: Importa archivos MIDI y proyectos de Hydrogen

trans-unit.resname: Musical Instruments
Built-in 64-bit VST instrument support with 32-bit VST bridge (64-bit Windows)
trans-unit.source: Built-in 64-bit VST instrument support with 32-bit VST bridge (64-bit Windows)
trans-unit.target: Soporte incorporado para instrumentos VST de 64-bit a través de 32-bit VST bridge (Windows 64-bit)

trans-unit.resname: 16 built in synthesizers, including emultations of Roland ® TB-303, Commodore 64 ® SID microchip, Nintendo ® NES and GameBoy, Yamaha ® OPL2 chip and more
trans-unit.source: 16 built in synthesizers, including emultations of Roland ® TB-303, Commodore 64 ® SID microchip, Nintendo ® NES and GameBoy, Yamaha ® OPL2 chip and more

trans-unit.resname: Embedded ZynAddSubFx: Polyphonic, mutlitimbral, microtonal, multi-voice additive, subtractive and pad synthesis all in one powerful plugin
trans-unit.source: Embedded ZynAddSubFx: Polyphonic, mutlitimbral, microtonal, multi-voice additive, subtractive and pad synthesis all in one powerful plugin

trans-unit.resname: Native multisample support for SoundFont ® (SF2), Giga (GIG) and Gravis UltraSound ® (GUS) formats for high quality instrument patches and banks
trans-unit.source: Native multisample support for SoundFont ® (SF2), Giga (GIG) and Gravis UltraSound ® (GUS) formats for high quality instrument patches and banks

trans-unit.resname: Effects Mixing
Drop-in LADSPA plug-in support
Drop-in VST ® effect plug-in support (Linux and Windows)
trans-unit.source: Drop-in VST ® effect plug-in support (Linux and Windows)
trans-unit.target: Soporte para complementos de efectos VST ® (Linux y Windows)

trans-unit.resname: Built-in compressor, limiter, delay, reverb, distortion and bass enhancer
trans-unit.source: Built-in compressor, limiter, delay, reverb, distortion and bass enhancer
trans-unit.target: Compresor incorporado, limitador, retardo, reverberación, distorsión e intensificador de bajos

Built-in visualization/spectrum analyzer

trans-unit.resname: Current competitions:
Past competitions:
The Best of LMMS vol. VI
trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. VI
trans-unit.target: Lo mejor de LMMS vol. VI

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 2nd, 2019**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-6)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/u/1/d/e/2PACX-1vQm-kulIpC2Na8ol7brGGmmK3aK4kz9AaUi0KIy1FrHUj6snVwCpdcDZqJ7unf_oIbGTmC4cWnP1tLW/pubhtml?gid=1466576535&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/768817671&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"></iframe>
#### Original description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 6! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59 UTC Time) on April 2nd for a chance to be featured on the BoL v6 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.
[Submit here](https://goo.gl/forms/lNmexmoqWiwiKDUf1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 2nd 2019 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/forms/lNmexmoqWiwiKDUf1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed. - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved. - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - The full track should be available at the submission link provided - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Abludo, Dystany, Heavenity Princess, Jacoby Davis, Pyrif, and Spekular. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
trans-unit.source:
#### The competition has ended on **April 2nd, 2019**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-6)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/u/1/d/e/2PACX-1vQm-kulIpC2Na8ol7brGGmmK3aK4kz9AaUi0KIy1FrHUj6snVwCpdcDZqJ7unf_oIbGTmC4cWnP1tLW/pubhtml?gid=1466576535&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/768817671&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"></iframe>
#### Original description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 6! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59 UTC Time) on April 2nd for a chance to be featured on the BoL v6 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.
[Submit here](https://goo.gl/forms/lNmexmoqWiwiKDUf1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 2nd 2019 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/forms/lNmexmoqWiwiKDUf1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed. - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved. - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - The full track should be available at the submission link provided - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Abludo, Dystany, Heavenity Princess, Jacoby Davis, Pyrif, and Spekular. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.

trans-unit.resname: The Best of LMMS vol. V
trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. V
trans-unit.target: Lo mejor de LMMS vol. V

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 16th, 2018**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-5)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQOjvIBp40ez-2QrPsGHt_LGY2XejaOFZrXWsgPVPXoH7w7QQriUV52_OeCQBL9tcOPlCxdUw2HC6Ud/pubhtml?gid=1958072675&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/519667455&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"></iframe>
#### Original description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 5! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59) on April 16th (UTC time) for a chance to be featured on the BoL v5 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.
[Submit here](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 16th 2018 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed.* - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved.* - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Dull Machine, Etorna_Z, Jernemies, Poleroyd, Umcaruje and Unfa. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will score each track and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
\* *This year the judging process has changed, to ensure fairer handling of entries. The change to one submission only is to allow each and every entry to be fully scored by the panel of judges. This was previously handled by a preliminary screening round to help cut down the large amount of entries received. By lowering the amount of up-front entries allowed, the judges will have the time to fully score each track entered.*
trans-unit.source:
#### The competition has ended on **April 16th, 2018**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-5)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQOjvIBp40ez-2QrPsGHt_LGY2XejaOFZrXWsgPVPXoH7w7QQriUV52_OeCQBL9tcOPlCxdUw2HC6Ud/pubhtml?gid=1958072675&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/519667455&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true"></iframe>
#### Original description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 5! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59) on April 16th (UTC time) for a chance to be featured on the BoL v5 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development.
[Submit here](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1) #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline:** - Track must be submitted by April 16th 2018 at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/47ZXq1). 2. **The Track:** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions:** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than ONE entry per artist is allowed.* - Collaborations count as ONE entry for each artist involved.* - No collaborating with judges on entries. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube, or Clyp are allowed. - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** -The jury consists of: Dull Machine, Etorna_Z, Jernemies, Poleroyd, Umcaruje and Unfa. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will score each track and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
\* *This year the judging process has changed, to ensure fairer handling of entries. The change to one submission only is to allow each and every entry to be fully scored by the panel of judges. This was previously handled by a preliminary screening round to help cut down the large amount of entries received. By lowering the amount of up-front entries allowed, the judges will have the time to fully score each track entered.*

trans-unit.resname: The Best of LMMS vol. IV
trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. IV
trans-unit.target: Lo Mejor de LMMS vol. IV

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 16th, 2017**. Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/album/the-best-of-lmms-vol-4)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pPoM7CQIg5C4uzgOrlRnytJiAsOD5K6jxitF-SIjXRQ/pubhtml?gid=975440614&single=true)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/321234884&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original Description: We are proud to present to you The Best of LMMS contest volume 4! The contest aims to inspire the community to create and share their music. Submit your track at the link below before midnight (23:59.59) on April 16th (UTC time) for a chance to be featured on the BoL v4 album. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp, with all profits going towards LMMS' further development. This year's submissions are handled through Google forms. We accept submissions hosted on YouTube, Soundcloud and Clyp. For the full rules check out the submission form: https://goo.gl/forms/cifEliOViOXTSc8H2 #### Competition rules: 1. **The Deadline** - Tracks must be submitted by April 16th at 23:59.59 UTC using [this form](https://goo.gl/forms/cifEliOViOXTSc8H2). 2. **The Tracks** - Must be produced in LMMS. - You may use other programs for mastering and post processing. - Must be under 10 minutes long. - No winning tracks from previous Best of LMMS albums allowed. - No remixes allowed. 3. **The Submissions** - You must submit using this form only. - No more than **TWO** entries per artist are allowed. - Collaborations count as **ONE** entry for each artist involved. - Only submissions hosted on Soundcloud, YouTube or Clyp are allowed. - Your entry must be available for listening until the end of the judging process. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges** - The jury consists of: Greippi, Jacoby Davis, Spekular, Stakeout Punch and Squatro. 5. **The Judging Process** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14 days. 6. **The Release** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of "Pay what you want". All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.resname: The Best of LMMS vol. III
trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. III
trans-unit.target: Lo Mejor de LMMS vol. III

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **March 16th, 2016.** Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/211975750&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description:
It’s that time of the year again: If you have made amazing tracks with LMMS we have a contest for you! The Best of LMMS contest is back! The compilation aims to inspire new users and everyone to create music. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp and all profit will be donated for the further development of LMMS. Submit your track before midnight on March 16th (UTC time), and find details about the contest on the [soundcloud group.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
#### Competition rules:
1. The Deadline. The tracks must be submitted by March 16th 0:00 UTC. The tracks can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. The track must be produced in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The tracks. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. You can submit a maximum of two tracks. You may submit previously released tracks, but not tracks that were in the previous Best of LMMS albums. Remixes are not allowed. A collaboration between a judge and yourself is not allowed. 3. The Judges. The jury consists of: Zach Henderson, Second Flight, Umcaruje, Greippi, Tres Finnochiaro, Abludo. 4. The Judging Process. After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within next 14 days. 5. Release. The compilation will be released on a dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
trans-unit.source:
#### The competition has ended on **March 16th, 2016.** Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v3)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/211975750&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description:

#### Competition rules:

The track must be produced in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The tracks. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. You can submit a maximum of two tracks. You may submit previously released tracks, but not tracks that were in the previous Best of LMMS albums. Remixes are not allowed. A collaboration between a judge and yourself is not allowed. 3. The Judges. The jury consists of: Zach Henderson, Second Flight, Umcaruje, Greippi, Tres Finnochiaro, Abludo. 4. The Judging Process. After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within next 14 days. 5. Release. The compilation will be released on a dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.

trans-unit.resname: The Best of LMMS vol. II
trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. II
trans-unit.target: Lo Mejor de LMMS vol. II

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **April 1st, 2015.**
Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/the-best-of-lmms-competition-v2)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/103762698&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description: 1. The Deadline. The songs must be submitted by April 1st 0:00 UTC. The songs can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. The song should be made mostly in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The songs. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. A user can submit a maximum of two songs. Users CAN submit previously released songs, BUT not songs submitted for previous BoL competitions. Remixes are not allowed. A song cooperation between a judge and yourself is not allowed. 3. The Judges and the Release. The judges consist of Stian Jørgensrud (Sti-Jay), Ian Letarte, Hashhakaj kamaluden, Fastigium, artlu, TRonix and Jernemies. The compilation will be released on the dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS or to cover other program related costs.
Extras:
By marking your song with the tag "Want Feedback" you can get feedback from the judges. Comments from different judges will be combined into one text so you won't know from who or how many the feedback is. Note that you aren't guaranteed any feedback, it depends on how much time the judges have. Also note that the judges are just regular LMMS artists and no matter what feedback you get the judges' decision for album songs is final.
trans-unit.source:

Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/)

All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. A user can submit a maximum of two songs. Users CAN submit previously released songs, BUT not songs submitted for previous BoL competitions. Remixes are not allowed. A song cooperation between a judge and yourself is not allowed. 3. The Judges and the Release. The judges consist of Stian Jørgensrud (Sti-Jay), Ian Letarte, Hashhakaj kamaluden, Fastigium, artlu, TRonix and Jernemies. The compilation will be released on the dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS or to cover other program related costs.
Extras:
By marking your song with the tag "Want Feedback" you can get feedback from the judges. Note that you aren't guaranteed any feedback, it depends on how much time the judges have. Also note that the judges are just regular LMMS artists and no matter what feedback you get the judges' decision for album songs is final.

trans-unit.resname: The Best of LMMS vol. I
trans-unit.source: The Best of LMMS vol. I
trans-unit.target: Lo Mejor de LMMS vol. I

trans-unit.resname:
#### The competition has ended on **February 15th, 2014.**
Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/lmms-top-songs-compilation)
Winners: <iframe width="100%%" height="350" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/27083727&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false"></iframe> #### Original description:
If you have made amazing songs with LMMS we have a contest for you! A LMMS top songs contest. The compilation aims to inspire new users and get new producers to use the program as well as to give a big thank you to LMMS developers. The compilation will be uploaded to Bandcamp and all profit will be donated for the further development of LMMS. Submit your song before midnight on February 15th, and find details about this contest on the Soundcloud site.
#### Competition rules: 1. The Deadline. The songs must be submitted by February 15th 12 PM GMT. A user can submit a maximum of two songs. The songs can be of any genre, preferably under 10 minutes. All submissions will be handled via SoundCloud using the dedicated group. User CAN submit previously released songs. Remixes are not allowed. The song should be made mostly in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The Judges. The judges consist of the group Avelocity: Brian Amin (Maniarib), Joshua Wade (Second Flight), Uroš Maravić (Umcaruje), Evan Roberts (Stakeout Punch), Joshua Flynn (Raptor980), Jan Heemstra (Combustible Lemonade) 3. The Judging Process. After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within next 7 days. 4. Release. The compilation will be released on a dedicated LMMS artists Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
trans-unit.source:
#### The competition has ended on **February 15th, 2014.**
Support LMMS and buy the compilation over at our [bandcamp page.](https://lmmsartists.bandcamp.com/)
Listen to all entries [here.](https://soundcloud.com/groups/lmms-top-songs-compilation)

The song should be made mostly in LMMS, but it is allowed to use some other software (Audacity, Ardour etc.) for post mixing/mastering. 2. The Judges. The judges consist of the group Avelocity: Brian Amin (Maniarib), Joshua Wade (Second Flight), Uroš Maravić (Umcaruje), Evan Roberts (Stakeout Punch), Joshua Flynn (Raptor980), Jan Heemstra (Combustible Lemonade) 3. If not, your entry will be disqualified. 4. **The Judges:** - The jury consists of: Cubician, Etorna_Z, Noeroti, Leche, Satori and Umcaruje. 5. **The Judging:** - After the deadline, the judges will make their decisions and release the results within 14 days. 6. **Release:** - The 25 highest scoring songs will be released as an album on Bandcamp with the price of “Pay what you want”. All the received funds will be donated for further development of LMMS, the program that we love.
